name: Chopped Greek Salad with Fresh Herbs
description: An authentic Greek salad with fresh chopped vegetables, herbs, feta cheese, lemon juice, and olive oil.  Add chopped grilled chicken to make it a meal, and be sure to serve it with warm bread to mop up all the lemon and herb-infused olive oil at the bottom of the bowl.
recipeIngredient: 1 medium seeded and diced cucumber (do not peel, about 2 cups)
2 large tomatoes, seeded and diced (about 3 cups)
1/3 cup finely chopped red onion, from one red onion
1/2 cup Greek green olives, pitted and quartered
3 tablespoons freshly squeezed juice from about 2 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and toss well. Serve immediately.
